name: The Tennis Master
description:
The protagonist of this adult visual novel is a disgraced former tennis champion. The former champion is hired by a mysterious businessman to coach his daughter Sofia.
The tennis master is not too keen on this hire, but accepts for financial reasons. He will soon find himself involved in something bigger than himself, shady deals revolving around the businessman and his family.
Features:
- 1800 images
- Ren'Py Engine
- 16 original animations
- 35 thousand words
- Music and sound effects
- You can choose the name of the main character
- Three different endings based on the choices you made.
Any is Gavril's wife.
She is a controversial woman, constantly fighting with herself.
She is intimidated by everything around her, she is afraid of her future, but she does everything she can to hide it.
Mischa is Gavril's sister.
Very confident, cunning, vindictive. Mischa is very clear about what she wants. She is as dangerous as she is sexy and passionate.
Sofia is the only daughter of Gavril and Anya.
She is a very intelligent girl. She is looking for a future that will make her happy. The situation in the villa where she lives is unstable and she fears for her life and that of her friend Lenina.
Lenina is part of the servants.
Constantly mistreated by Anya, she, like her friend Sofia, is looking for a way out.
Lenina is humble and submissive, selfless and kind.
Irina is Gavril's right-hand man
She is a very strong woman, a fighter, she bases her life on honour and respect for the chain of command.
However, she hides a big secret, something that contradicts her ideals.
Gavril is a rich businessman.
Authoritarian, strong, arrogant and overbearing. He bases his power on the strength and submission of the people around him.
A power, however, that is destined to fall, precisely because of his arrogance.
You're a former tennis champion with too many skeletons in your cupboard.
Constantly searching for a way forward, you're still not sure what your true identity is. Who are you? What do you want from life? Power? Love? Respect? Soon you will understand.
